variants.name: Full page preview
variants.notes: This preview is for when you need to view a component/s in the full website context.

variants.name: Article page preview
variants.notes: This preview is specific to the article template to view it in situ.

variants.name: No main section preview
variants.notes: For previewing components that you don't want generated within the 'main' element. - (eg. footer, masthead etc.)

variants.name: Yield only
variants.notes: This preview is typically for 'static' pages where all the HTML is added. - (eg. 500 error page)
